p: Forty-eight male Wistar rats (weight: 120–140 g) were purchased from Beijing Vital River Laboratory Animal Technology Co., Ltd. (license number: SCXK (Jing) 2012-0001). Animals were maintained at standard room temperature (22 ± 2 °C) and relative humidity (60 ± 5%) with a 12 h light/dark cycle with food and water available ad libitum. All experimental procedures were approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
